reviews.review_msg: Loved his enthusiam for 20 cent. Poetry GOOD JOB

Extremely brilliant prof as well as my easiest course this semester, lectures are really engaging and he is ridiculously passionate about what he is teaching.  Was pleasantly surprised with the profs at SFU as i wasn't expecting lecturers to be so excited about what they were teaching. Makes me want to take all of his classes
exasperating lectures--needs to be discriminating instead of encouraging moronic thought from all the eager beaver pseudo-intellectuals. unapproachable outside of class.
